ContactController.HeadingText: We would love to discuss with you about the projects
ContactController.Option3: Talk to max, our AI chatbot
ContactController.ScheduleACallbackHeading: Please provide a date you are free to talk in this format YYYY-MM-DD
ContactController.LiveAgentText: Our customer care number is 0745020416. One of our agents will call you from this number to assist you. Thank you for choosing us for your energy solutions
ContactController.ChatbotText: Here at Maximoff, we have a toll free, automated reply system. We call it Max. Max is a chatbot that will answer your questions. To talk to Max, please text the alphanumeric MAX. Thank you for choosing us for your energy solutions.
